name: Access Denied
description: Detects log entries indicating access denial. This pattern is case-insensitive.

name: SQL Injection Attempt
description: Detects log entries indicating attempted SQL injection attacks.

name: Unauthorized Access Attempt
description: Detects log entries indicating unauthorized access attempts to sensitive resources. This pattern is case-insensitive.

name: Wordpress Attack
description: Detects log entries making post requests to sensitive Wordpress endpoint.

name: Remote Code Execution Attempt
description: Detects log entries indicating attempts to download and execute remote code.

name: Directory Traversal Attempt
description: Detects log entries indicating attempts to perform directory traversal.

name: Sensitive Information Disclosure Attempt
description: Detects log entries indicating attempts to disclose sensitive information.

name: XMLRPC Attack
description: Detects log entries indicating XMLRPC-based attacks.
